title: As a User, I want to Remove Players from the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - There will be a trash can icon in each row in the Trade Contract Info widget, as depicted in the wire
 - Clicking the icon will remove the row from the widget
 - There will be a Clear All button on the widget, as depicted in the wire
 - Clicking the Clear All button will prompt the user to confirm they wish to clear all players
- If they confirm the decision, all rows  will be cleared from the widget
- If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a User, I want to View the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - BOC and Club Users with the appropriate permissions will see a Trade Contract Info widget on the "Player Tracking" tab of the Transactions Dashboard
 - The widget will appear under the Current DFA Players widget
 - The header of the widget will display the prorated MJ Minimum salary as of Today
 - The header of the widget will display the prorated MJ Minimum salary as of Tomorrow

title: As a User, I want to Add a Player to the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - There will be an Add Row button on the Trade Contract Info widget, as depicted in the wire
 - Clicking the button will add a row to the bottom of the widget
 - If necessary, the widget will auto-scroll so the new row is in view
 - The widget will also auto-horizontal scroll so the Name field is in view and in focus.  
 - The player column will be the only editable column
 -  The Player column will be an auto-complete with a population of all players with a currently approved MJ Contract
 -  Selecting a player from the auto-complete will populate all the appropriate fields with the correct data points from the players profile

title: As a User, I want to view option information in the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - The Option column will be hyper linked
 - Clicking on the link will open a modal that displays information on all of the options tied to the player's current MJC.  This information includes:
- Option Year
- Option Type
- Option Amount
- Buyout Amount

title: As a User, I want to view NTP Teams on Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - The No Trade Teams column will be hyper linked
 - Clicking on the link will open a modal that displays all of the teams listed in the player's Limited No Trade Provision

title: As a User, I want to view Assignment Bonus comments from the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - Assignment Bonus amounts  will be hyper linked in the Trade Contract Info widget
 - Clicking on the link will open a modal that displays the language associated with the covenant on the Player's Assignment Clause on his current MJC

title: As a User, I want to view contract summary information from the Trade Contract Info Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - The Summary column will contain a comment bubble as depicted in the wire
 - Clicking on the bubble will open a modal that displays whether or not the contracts contains the following clauses:
- Salary Escalators
- Performance Bonuses
- Deferred Comp
- Misc Text
 - If the contract does not contain any of those clauses, there will not be a comment bubble in the column

title: As a User, I want to View clubs who have received more than $800k in the past 6 months
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

Cash Considerations Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5844+Report+Details

AC:
 - In the header of the widget, there will be a list of "Clubs who received +800k in the last 6 months", as depicted in the wire
 - This list will use same logic as the first page of the Cash Considerations Report
 - This list of clubs will match the list of clubs displayed on the Cash Summary tab of the Cash Considerations report

title: As a User, I want to open a contract directly from the Trade Contract Info widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=trade_contract_info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Trade+Contract+Info+widget

AC:
 - The Overall Salary Tom column should be a hyperlink
- Clicking the hyperlink will open the player's MJC in a new browser tab
